title: Big Shot
description: Punch and Judy star in the show that brings you information about fugitives, for the 300,000 bounty hunters in the star system.
quote: If you kill him, kiss your reward goodbye!
altHero: Punch and Judy in their cowboy garb back to back holding pistols
alt2: Punch with “Double Bonus!!” written over the screen
alt4: Punch stands with Judy as she reads from a long scroll
